relationships.description: Requesting latest version of film from Jeffrey

analysis.purpose: To inform Steve Bannon that a document/film version has been sent via ProtonMail
analysis.significance: Shows communication about a film project potentially related to Trump, using secure email service

notable_quotes: Just sent to you from my ProtonMail
Can we get Jeffrey latest version of film
red_flags: Use of ProtonMail (encrypted email service) for communication

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion found

illegal_activity.description: No illegal activity discussed or evidenced

public_knowledge.context: Communication involving Steve Bannon and reference to 'Trump@War' film project could be of media interest given Bannon's role in Trump administration

analysis.summary: Sean Banno emails Steve Bannon confirming he has sent something via ProtonMail, responding to Bannon's request for Jeffrey's latest version of a film project potentially related to Trump.
